s2.ptxt: Install the headlight dimmer switch with the claw as shown in the illustration.
Install the headlight dimmer switch with the clamp.
Connect the connector.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL WIPER AND WASHER SWITCH ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Attach the claw to install the windshield wiper switch assembly.

atten3.ptxt: Do not push the claw with excessive force as damage may occur.

s2.ptxt: Connect the connectors.
Check that the front wheels are facing straight ahead.
Set the turn signal switch to the neutral position.

atten3.ptxt: Make sure that the turn signal switch is in the neutral position, as the pin of the turn signal switch may be snapped.

s2.ptxt: Install the spiral cable.

atten3.ptxt: When replacing the spiral cable with a new one, remove the lock pin before installing the steering wheel.

s2.ptxt: Connect the connectors to the spiral cable.

atten3.ptxt: When handling the airbag connector, do not damage the airbag wire harness.

s2.ptxt: Install the lower cover with the 3 screws.
Install the lower cover with the 3 screws.
Align the matchmarks on the steering wheel and main shaft.
Install the steering set nut.

s-1.ptxt: PLACE FRONT WHEELS FACING STRAIGHT AHEAD

s2.ptxt: Support the steering pad with one hand.
Connect the connector to the steering pad.

atten3.ptxt: When handling the airbag connector, take care not to damage the airbag wire harness.

s2.ptxt: Connect the horn connector.
Confirm that the groove along the circumference of the "TORX" screw is attached to the screw case and place the steering pad onto the steering wheel.
Using a T30 "TORX" socket wrench, tighten the 2 screws.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT CABLE TO NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL

s2.ptxt: With the steering pad installed on the vehicle, perform a visual check. If there are any defects as mentioned below, replace the steering pad with a new one:
Cuts, minute cracks or marked discoloration on the steering pad top surface or in the grooved portion.
Make sure that the horn sounds.
If the horn does not sound, inspect the horn system.
Perform initialization (see page ).

atten3.ptxt: Certain systems need to be initialized after disconnecting and reconnecting the cable from the negative (-) battery terminal.

s2.ptxt: Check the SRS warning light (see page ).
